description: This recipe is by Craig Claiborne and takes 1 hour. Tell us what you think of it at The New York Times - Dining - Food.
title: Chicken with Champagne Sauce (Poulet Zaza)
title_page: Chicken with Champagne Sauce (Poulet Zaza) Recipe - NYT Cooking
text: Ideally, the chicken should be cut as follows: Two legs, two thighs. Have the breast cut lengthwise in half. Leave the main wing bone attached to each breast half. Cut each breast half crosswise into two pieces of more or less equal size. Reserve the extraneous pieces (backbone, neck, etc.) for another use such as stock.
